title: Fine Cotton Goods Production for United States
notes:
Data Reported By 24 Identical Mills In The New Bedford District Representing About 50% Of The Fine Cotton Goods Industry In New England And From 20-30% Throughout The U.S. Source: Survey Of Current Business, Record Book Of Business Statistics, Part I, P. 33; 1931 Supplement, P. 137.

This NBER data series m01094 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01094
